Helping create a safer, more efficient maritime industry

Voyager Worldwide provides automation and data intelligence solutions to help the global maritime industry to streamline processes, unlock insight and boost productivity, safety and cost-effectiveness

Watch Voyager in action Request a call back from our expert team

Voyager Worldwide is the new company name
for Cornes Chart Group, Safe Navigation and Global Navigation Solutions.

About Us

A powerful ecosystem
that will transform your business

Ship management

Get a clear view of what’s happening to find and fix problems faster and improve the effectiveness of your ship management team.

Learn More

Vessel navigation

Make e-navigation easy with automation and simplicity that helps crews navigate more safely and efficiently.

Learn More

Maritime suppliers

Enhance sales and marketing and improve after-sales customer care with access to our unique maritime database.

Learn More

Empower your operations with insightful information

Get a clear view of what’s happening in today’s complex maritime environment to find and fix problems faster and improve the effectiveness of your ship management operation.

  • View our ship management tools in action
  • Get started with a free trial

Manage every navigation task from one dashboard

Reduce the time spent on navigation with a single dashboard to manage digital and paper navigation compliance, route and passage planning. Automate repetitive tasks and improve the crews overall e-navigation experience. Collect and view key data such as vessel routes ashore and track against live vessel positions.

  • View our bridge software in action
  • Get started with a free trial

Target maritime sales and marketing more effectively

Focus sales and marketing efforts and improve conversion rates using over 100 different search criteria including AIS destination and eta, nautical miles sailed and vessel characteristics like Flag and Class.

  • View VFI Global Fleet service in action
  • Get started with a free trial

Delivering 24/7 support to more than 12,000 vessels worldwide

You aren’t 9-5 so neither are we. We provide service and support from experienced mariners and navigation experts to keep your fleet moving. 24/7.

  • Learn more
